comment: The design alone is good. I'd like to see other options for the lower dial, like those on the dev's other watch faces (weather, battery, etc.). The compass doesn't work, no matter how much you try to calibrate it. 4 stars if that's fixed, 5 for step/cycling sync with Fit.
title: Good, not great

author: bryan kestle
comment: Awesome face. It would be nice to test the colors without the app screen going back to main option screen every color change. Small complaint for a working compass on the huawei.
title: Very nice! Compass works on Huawei

author: Rob she
comment: Doesn't do what it should. ..steps don't get counted properly. .if it worked if use it. ..another watch face disappointment. Ok watch face to look at.

author: Joel Nihlean
comment: The pedometer on this watch used to be reasonably accurate, and match up more or less with Google Fit, now it is typically several thousand steps short.
title: Pedometer doesn't work anymore

author: Joe Simone
comment: I've installed it... so where is the watchface? Doesn't show up in Android wear.
title: Garbage

author: Matt Barr
comment: May be my favorite face. Not a ton of customization options, but in this case that's good, it saves you from yourself when you want to screw around with a really sharp design. Love being able to put my initials on it. Great feature, like developer's other faces.

author: andrew spice
comment: happy with how it looks however have no idea how to customize the face, colors, dials or anything with it. please inform how to do this, I am using a sony smartwatch 3 (SWR50). if you cannot help me, I will be seeking a refund.

author: Joseph Stainback
comment: I absolutely love this watch face.  It is my goto face for my moto 360 smart watch.  My only wish is that there was a more "green" option for the color setting. But aside from that this watch face is battery friendly and shows all the info you need while looking like a real watch.  Worth the price for sure. And you can customize the text in the hallmark.. Even more to love.
title: My go to watch face every time

author: Mark Jensen
comment: I've tried many too many wear faces,   and this one is in my top 5.  Great sport watch look with lots of functionality.  The ambient mode even looks great and keeps me from having to tap into the fully lit face... So it functions much like your normal time at-a-glance watch without the ridiculous need for the constant wrist-gyrating gestures. That alone makes it worth the price!
title: Among the best watches!

author: Damien Walsh
comment: I have this as my watch face most of the time now. Looks great on my Sony Smartwatch 3. Ambient mode is great too. The step counter is a nice dial to have, I just wish it was accurate. It would be nice to have the option to show the battery as a percentage rather than an icon.
title: Nice watch face but needs a little improvement

author: Zee Valliani
comment: Not sure if Moto 360 has a compass functionality, but it's always points to North. Any suggestions?
title: Compass not working on Moto 360

author: John Starling
comment: No settings available!
title: Can't change colours on Sony Smart Watch 3

author: Eric E
comment: Like the look and the idea but I have no way to adjust settings on my zenwatch or note4. There is no escape watch face app in my app drawer. Therefore I can not try the compass feature and the pedometer counts almost triple the steps

author: Juan Emilio Canales
comment: It is awsome. Works as advertised, cant say the same about any others. I wrote my name on its face even. I recommend it highly. Woks excellent with Samsung Gear.
title: Escape watch face

author: Reggie Norman
comment: The watch face is great, but the step count is wrong. Not sure where those numbers are coming from, but they do not match the Google Fit numbers that are on my watch.

author: Steve Spring
comment: The selection of colors coupled with the on screen customization makes this face really well done.
title: Beautiful and customizable

author: Tony Zoccolillo
comment: Steps are not read from Fit, they seem to be counted from time of turning on watch face.  Otherwise, great look and compass seems to work.
title: Good but...

author: A.J Mathew
comment: Not sure if the huawei watch has a compass built in, but it doesn't show up on the watchface
title: Great watchface

comment: I was begged to rate before I tried it out. I'm sure it's fine
title: Looks good

author: Kian Kashani
comment: Can't figure out how to customise it as there is no phone app.
title: How do you change dials & colors?

author: Shaun Dunphy
comment: This is one of my favourite watch faces. Works well on Moto 360 second generation. Thank you!
title: Impressive

author: Andy Francis
comment: It would be 5 stars if you you could have a third option to change 2nd dial to battery indicator.
title: Missing battery indicator.

author: Zahid Din
comment: A face for every occasion, and then some more!
title: So much variety from these guys

author: Itay Raz
comment: So I'm uninstall it!
title: Excellent but step count stop working

author: Juan Carlos Pentecost
comment: What's depicted in the picture is all you can change.
title: Needs More Customization

author: Bernie R Pinsonat
comment: Love this watch face - one of my favorites
title: Great Watch Face

author: Julian Chebishev
comment: I like it even it could be better
title: Not bad at all

author: 360 Picture UK
comment: ...needs the extra settings as found on the Ranger face.
title: Great but...

author: Lewis Neale
comment: Brilliant app no issues at all
title: Sony smartwatch

author: Louis Solomon
comment: Your Legacy 2.0 watch face is way better

author: Alex Chai
comment: won't load

author: Neil Carter
comment: Very nice
title: Lg g smart watch

author: Keith Wannop
comment: Solid and well designed.
title: Absolute favourite

author: Paul Fessler
comment: Working well

author: Ketzal Sterling
comment: Nice and bright ambient mode with legible time. Amazing how many watch faces get this wrong. Great work.
title: Best Ambient Mode I've found

author: Andi Darmika
comment: Love the design, need option to disable bottom dial. And also battery optimization please ;)
title: Need optimization

author: SK Das
comment: After recent update hands color does not change

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Hi, Weird! Does it still not work. On our devices we cannot reproduce this. Any help would be really appreciated. Thx, Hans

title: Hands Color does not change after update

author: Mark DeVoll
comment: Get it!
title: Watch face!!

author: Ziad Adada
comment: I love it this is my 3rd face from your collection
title: Best watch

author: T.W. Cook
comment: I keep coming back to this face because it's attractive and very readable in both regular and ambient modes (on Sony SW3 in my case), and because the square face is well thought out rather that just being an afterthought. However, I have never been able to get either steps or compass to display useful values. Frankly I don't care about those very much anyway, and would be happy with an option to turn both off and display nothing there. I'd be 5 stars if I could just hide those, or maybe replace them with an outside temperature display.
title: Super readable
